description:
The Zen of CherryPy

Presented by Robert E Brewer

CherryPy will be 8 years old in June 2010! This presentation will look
at the "Zen of CherryPy": a set of 10 design guidelines which CherryPy
has developed over those years, explaining why they're useful, why some
are uniquely Python, and how to apply them in your own projects.
title: The Zen of CherryPy (#111)
